description: A deliciously spiced wholesome breakfast with crunch.
keywords: Granola,Cherry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Baked Cherry Granola with Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a mixing bowl, combine all ingredients together apart from the yoghurt.
Now empty contents onto a baking tray lined with baking paper and spread out to bake for 20 minutes. Remove from the oven once cooked, allow to cool before serving layered with the yoghurt.
